entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 30%

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast late this evening and overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High zero.
